data.eml:eml: Hypostomus velhochico, a new keeled Hypostomus Lacépède, 1803 (Siluriformes: Loricariidae) from the rio São Francisco basin in Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Zawadzki, Cláudio H., Oyakawa, Osvaldo T., Britski, Heraldo A. (2017): Hypostomus velhochico, a new keeled Hypostomus Lacépède, 1803 (Siluriformes: Loricariidae) from the rio São Francisco basin in Brazil. Zootaxa 4344 (3), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4344.3.7
